channel.title: Whenever I try to run a client I get an error message saying
channel.description:
I wasn't sure on where to post this...but whenever I try to run a client I get an error message saying...
......"'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue. . ."
I don't know what to do, I have winrar, I have Java 6 update 11. Every client I try to run gives me the same error message after I extract it to a new folder and try to run it.
Am I missing something?

item.title: Whenever I try to run a client I get an error message saying

@verak wrote:

you need to have JDK, then edit your .bat file and Chance the current JDk version to ur current one.
